data.title: THE HOOTERS
data.text:
Announcing The Hooters Annual Homecoming!

The “Rocking & Swinging” continues this November as The Hooters proudly return to The Keswick Theatre for a weekend full of surprises as they wrap up their 2024 Tour.

Catch A Late Summer Weekend With The Hooters!

Get ready for a late summer weekend of Hooterization!

Announcing “More Rocking, More Swing” Tour 2024!

The Hooters are headed back overseas in continued support of their newest album in over 10 years, Rocking & Swing!

PRESENTING THE OFFICIAL “WHY WON’T YOU CALL ME BACK” MUSIC VIDEO!

The Hooters are thrilled to present the official video for “Why Won’t You Call Me Back”, the first single off their new album, Rocking & Swing.

Announcing “Rocking & Swing”!

The Hooters are excited to announce the release of Rocking & Swing, their first new studio recording since 2010! The new album will be released on May 12th through their own Hooters Music label and will be available on vinyl and CD along with digital streaming services.

But Wait There’s More!

In addition to their new album “Rocking & Swing”, The Hooters are proud to announce the re-release of their debut 45 single from 1981, “Fightin’ On The Same Side + Wireless”.

“Where Do The Children Go”

Live From Lucerne

Last March we played our first European show in four years in Lucerne, Switzerland. Covid was still a concern (some of us caught it on the way home), and war in Ukraine had just broken out, barely a month before, in February.

“LIVE IN GERMANY” video!

The Hooters perform live to a sold-out crowd at the Rock of Ages festival in Seebronn, Germany - July 2018.

the hooters music team

For general inquries contact us at: info@hootersmusic.com
